comment.author: 48231610@N00
comment._content: I love the activity captured here. This is fantastic.

comment.author: 37512236@N00
comment._content: This is great... I love the other photos of women workers, but this feels so much more truthful

comment.author: 41378066@N00
comment._content: I agree. No lipstick, fancy hairstyles or nice clothes. This photo doesn't have the "staged" feel like most of the other working women photos in this set.

comment.author: 71018547@N00
comment._content: Wow, this one is really something. Easily a favorite.

comment.author: 23224989@N07
comment._content: Title:  Business As Usual

comment.author: 16874634@N00
comment._content: The coveralls tell the truth. And thats the way it was.

comment.author: 23354264@N06
comment._content: When it says "their rest room," does that mean men have a separate one?

comment.author: 22867700@N04
comment._content: These photos are priceless! Unfortunately, I'm spending hours browsing them and imagining what it was like in those days.

comment.author: 26330030@N04
comment._content: I am glad they have these as I grew up in Clinton, Iowa and remember the huge railroad yard. This was 50s and 60s for me and now the rail yard is gone.

comment.author: 24331896@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Clinton Iowa, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 13608638@N00
comment._content: Wow.  A Rockwellian tableau.

comment.author: 23072476@N02
comment._content: I own a pair of goggles almost exactly like the ones these ladies have.

comment.author: 29572970@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Man @ work, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: This image has been used in the indicommons.org post Interview: Helena Zinkham, Prints & Photographs Division, Library of Congress -- for, perhaps, those red fingernails.

comment.author: 71212393@N00
comment._content: i wonder what they are talking about

comment.author: 80888375@N00
comment._content: Their probably talking about having their picture taken and, gee, doesn't it take a lot of work just to take our picture, but, the guy with the camera said it will in color and you know I've never seen a color picture of myself before, except in the mirror you know. I wish they'd hurry up though, cause we got to get back to work soon....

comment.author: 8115643@N05
comment._content: phenomenal shot. I am impressed how good the quality is after all these years.
